page.shortlink: form layout appearance button class property
page.description: One or more classes applied to the button

discussion.p: The *[ui:Button class]* property is used to define one or more classes for a button in the FormView layout. If you specify <Default> or an empty string, the default class for buttons is used. Specify <none> if you do not want any button class.
